title: Accor Luxury in the Heart of Mysore
description: Discover India's most enchanting city and UNESCO World Heritage-listed site, Mysore, from a lavish launchpad: Grand Mercure Mysore, a luxury hotel part of the acclaimed Accor group, nestled in the heart of it all and currently ranked #1 hotel in the city on TripAdvisor. Soak up the Mysore's royal heritage, idyllic monuments and vibrant streets as you enjoy daily breakfast, decadent dinner for two once during your stay, a nightly cocktail per person and 25% discount on spa treatments.
offer_address: 2203/60 Nelson Mandela Circle, New Sayyaji Rao Rd, Mysuru, Karnataka, 570021, India

title: Mercure Luxury in the Heart of Mysuru
description: Discover the beauty and UNESCO World Heritage-listed site of Mysore staying at the Grand Mercure Mysuru, rated among the top 3 hotels in the city. Includes daily breakfasts, one buffet dinner each for two once during your stay, nightly cocktails and spa discount.
offer_address: 2203/60 Nelson Mandela Circle, New Sayyaji Rao Rd, Mysuru, Karnataka, 570021, India
